task.summary: Default task
Refactor `Snapshot` implementation, add `SqlConnectionInfo` and `SqlAuthentication`, update extensions, and target .NET 10.
Sqlite development and migration development of initial database tables.
Refactor migrations and database layer: standardize column lengths, replace `hash` with `record_hash`, add new attributes to tables, and improve SQLite session handling.

Refactor database layer: remove unused migrations, standardize column definitions, add detailed entity mappings (e.g., `ProgramMap`, `TaskMap`, `RoutineMap`), and adjust `description` column size in `data_type`.

Refactor data import and mapping layers: streamline generics for `ColumnMap` and `TableMap`, introduce detailed import classes (e.g., `SqliteTaskImport`, `SqliteProgramImport`), and add `CrossReferenceMap`.
Remove unused mappings (`CrossReferenceMap`), commands (`MigrateCommand`), and extensions (`ServiceExtensions`); refactor setup for CLI services and database imports for improved clarity.
Remove outdated SQLite import classes, update README with detailed documentation, and refine .csproj for NuGet packaging.
Add GitHub Actions for CI and release workflows with .NET build, test, and package steps
Add sample L5X XML file for testing Logix project imports. Updated TestSource.cs to point to embedded resource. Made local example explicit for now.
Update SnapshotTests to use LocalTest source instead of hardcoded file path.
Remove outdated installation instructions from README.
Refactor database layer: introduce SqlServer support, enhance migration handling, standardize connection workflows, and update SQLite database operations for improved consistency and async support.

Remove unused `ExitCodes`, `Format`, and `SqlAuthentication` classes; replace with consolidated `ErrorCodes`. Refactor mappings (`TableName` overrides). Simplify CLI app setup and enhance database handling (`SqliteDatabase`).

Remove CLI commands, database factory abstractions, related tests, and SQLite/SQL Server factory implementations; introduce `SqliteQuery` for snapshot-related SQL operations. Updated testing setup. Worked on SqlServer support.

Refactor database layer: replace service provider-based migration handling with scoped provider instances; remove IDisposable/AsyncDisposable from `ILogixDb`, standardize connection handling, and update relevant tests.
Update `MsSqlBuilder` image to use `mssql:2022-latest` in SQL Server test fixture.
Update GitHub Actions to use `ubuntu-latest` runners and switch from PowerShell to Bash for version extraction.
Refactor: Standardize column mappings and table schemas, remove deprecated fields, and update references for consistency across migrations and mapping files. Updated and fixed tests
Remove redundant `dimensions` column assertion from `M20260207Tests`.
Update `M20260207Tests` to assert `constant` column type as `bit` instead of `int`.
Extract SQL Server container lifecycle management to `SqlServerTestContainer` class and refactor `SqlServerTestFixture` for static test utilities.

Implement snapshot and import refactoring: - **Snapshots**: Introduced `SnapshotAction` for managing snapshot behaviors (`Append`, `ReplaceLatest`, `ReplaceAll`) and updated snapshot handling in SQLite and SQL Server databases. - **Imports**: Added modular SQL Server import classes (`SqlServerAoiImport`, `SqlServerControllerImport`, `SqlServerDataTypeImport`, etc.) for element processing. - **Refactoring**: Consolidated and simplified SQL operations, improved exception handling, and extended snapshot-related methods across database layers. - **Testing**: Added tests for snapshot delete scenarios, including `DeleteSnapshotsFor`, `DeleteSnapshotLatest`, and `DeleteSnapshotsBefore`. - **General**: Updated XML configuration, enhanced comments, and removed redundant database-layer code.

Add comprehensive tests for SQLite snapshot operations and enhance query logic
- Added new test cases for list, delete, drop, get, and purge snapshot scenarios in SQLite. - Updated `SqliteQuery` to include `target_key` in snapshot-related SQL queries. - Improved exception handling for database migrations by enhancing `MigrationRequiredException` messages. - Ensured migration needs are checked correctly during snapshot operations. - Refactored `SqliteDb` methods to use `EnsureCreatedAndMigrated` for improved consistency.

Refactor CLI commands: consolidate and rename commands (`snapshot` to generalized names like `import`, `list`, `delete`), remove `SnapshotReplaceCommand`, and standardize namespaces for consistency. Optimize Snapshot model and related test adjustments.
Enhance CLI commands: improve comments, add examples, better exception handling, and parameter updates for `list`, `migrate`, `delete` (renamed to `prune`), and `import`. Introduce `export` command.

Improve CLI commands with enhanced exception handling, updated output formatting (added `hash` to tables), and refactored methods for `list`, `prune`, `purge`, `import`, and `drop`. Ensure consistent namespace use.
Add cancellation token support to CLI commands for enhanced async operation handling. Update `export` command with improved validation, descriptions, and exception handling.

Add cancellation token support across CLI commands for improved async handling. Update `list`, `migrate`, `prune`, `purge`, `import`, `export`, and `drop` commands for consistency and enhanced validation. Add new tests for `ListCommand` functionality.

Refactor database layer and CLI tests: - Replace `SqliteQuery` with `SqlStatement` and update method references for consistency. - Add new SQL commands for snapshot and target deletion. - Introduce `TestDbFixture` for shared test database setup and teardown logic. - Add and update tests for `ListCommand` and `MigrateCommand`. - Remove unused classes and reorganize test files for clarity.

Refactor tests and database layer: - Update test setup methods to async across SQLite and SQL Server tests. - Add comprehensive tests for `SqlServerDbAddSnapshot`. - Rename and reorganize test files for consistency. - Remove `value_hash` column from `TagMap` and related components. - Improve `TableMap` to handle null values and ensure efficient row addition. - Refactor `SqlServerElementImport` to enhance bulk copy logic and column mapping. - Update migration files for `RungTable` and remove unnecessary columns (`value_hash`).

Add `UploadCommandTests` with comprehensive test cases for L5X file imports. Rename CLI `ImportCommand` to `UploadCommand` and update references accordingly. Upgrade test packages and adjust namespaces for consistency.

Rename `ImportCommand` to `UploadCommand` and `ExportCommand` to `DownloadCommand` in test cases and methods. Add L5X file generation to tests for enhanced coverage. Update namespaces, test resources, and verification files for consistency.
Update `UploadCommand` description for improved clarity: "Imports" → "Uploads"
Update `.idea` workspace configuration: adjust paths, rename commands, and increment task counter.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Update `.idea` workspace configuration: adjust paths, rename commands, and increment task counter.
